repnme.cdata!:
Ghana - Second Reconstruction Imports
            Credit Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Reconstruction Import Credit
            Project will make available US$60 million equivalent to
            support the Government of Ghana's economic recovery
            program which has been reviewed and found satisfactory to
            the Association. These funds will be allocated to the
            procurement of priority items under the Government's
            1985 import program which constitutes part of the economic
            recovery program. Sectors to be covered under the Credit
            will be agriculture, transport, mining, and manufacturing
            industries which are the most important sectors for the
            objectives of the economic recovery program and are in line
            with the Association's strategies for the
            rehabilitation and recovery of the Ghanaian economy.
